message:
I've posted this long time ago, there:
https://www.hackintosh.zone/hackintosh-topic/6037-wifi-sound-and-ati-5145-vga-on-asus-k52jb/

but got no answer, maybe someone here can help?

 
I installed the latest version Yosemite 10.10.1 on my Asus laptop, K52JB:
http://www.asus.com/Notebooks_Ultrabooks/K52JB/specifications/

 
i5 with 8GB ram
 
first partition has windows 8.1, Yosemite is on a second separate partition of almost 50GB space.
 
But it only works with GraphicsEnabler=No
 
So, poor VGA (ATI mobility radeon HD 5145 - 512MB)
also No sound and no wifi (Qualcomm Atheros AR9285)
 
 
So, is there anything can be done to make it fully functioning ?
or should I let it go? :(
 
if I should let it go, how can I remove it and restore the windows bootloader?
 
Thank you in advance :)

data.message: AFAIK Hackintoshs had to be installed on PCs with exact similar H/W specs as a real Mac. So if your wifi card for example has never been used in an actual mac the OS will never recognize it.

You can identify the boot partition using fdisk, and go from there to replace the bootsector with a windows one. All windows ISO installations have a bootsect.exe in them that you can use to install the boot sector. But there are other easier ways I persume.
You have better chances installing Mac OS on a desktop pc, where u can customize the specs while building to guarantee the result.
Linux can be for developers... Mac for Designers... Windows for Office :D
then get a mac .. it will never be the same even if u install it on windows ... the trackpad .. keyboard .. wifi .. bluetooth .. a lot of issues to resolve and it wont be the same :D
go for windows .. windows is good (a beautiful lie)

I've just sold my mac :D
I depend more on my iPad
I was just testing Hackintosh, that's all... Don't really need it :)

ah ok :D 
Hackintosh is really weird and you may have the same specs like someone online and it won't work .. because you forgot a variable or sth and the kernel panics .. lol it was hell ... but fun :D

بالنسبة للوايفاى مش هينفع، حاول تتعايش مع كارت وايفاى خارجى بيبقى دونجل صغير كده USB ممكن تجيبه فى حدود ال ٨٠ جنيه مثلآ 
بالنسبة لكارت الجرافيكس، المفروض تلاقى kext مناسب لكارت الجرافيكس بتاعك و حاول تقفل ال switchable graphics علشان يشوف كارت الإنتل بس ، لأن ساعات بيتلخبط بين الكارتين و ممكن تجرب اكتر من بوت لودر انا اللى شغال معايا chemeleon
الصوت نزله درايفر VoodooHDA الأخير احتمال كبير يشتغل الناس عاملين فيه شغل كويس
انا عندى فيه مشكلة واحدة ان الأيونة بتاعته مش بتقلل و تعلى الصوت و بضطر اعلى و اوطى من السلايدر بتاع PCM فى الSettings.
البلوتوث برضه مش شغال تعايش برضه :D
You shoud search for the drivers which are kernel extensions they will work better only if these drivers exists
